title: i wrote this just to have more pictures on the website
body:
Of course, games like archangels need to have art in them. I chose to start pixel art since it seemed the easiest. For the sake of my ego, I hope that's not true. To be honest, I haven't tried drawing anything much at all for like the last month or so. But I'll have to make art for archangels eventually, so we'll see how that goes. The only piece I made that I liked so far was...
Hold on.. let me summon the courage to show you..

In case you can't tell, its a white-haired girl with a halo and a tail.
I'm not showing you anything else. It's embarrassing.
date: Jan 2024 (but the drawing was like Nov or so)
